name: Tesseract 3D
description:
Built on the idea of the original Tesseract, this adventure into deep three-dimensional space provides a new experience to players desiring an adventure.

Just like the original Tesseract, you will collect fuel canisters and maneuver your way through a large asteroid field to survive. However, your mission is to collect a series of transponders scattered throughout the solar system in order to activate a specified portal, which will then bring you to your next location. As you make this perilous journey you must conserve what little fuel you have while also finding the transponders along the way. Humanity relies on your efforts to bounce back from its technological dark age.

New Features:

-  Barrel Roll

-  Rear View  (See your character!)

-  Levels  (3 worlds, 10 levels each)

-  An epic soundtrack (30 tracks)

Future Features:

- Character Customization

- Holiday World

- Halloween World

- Lore
